response: No it does not come with a battery.

because there are several prices of the same product of the I besiege amazon for this product? Is there some difference among them?
response: I would just purcahse at the lowesr price. This is a Cessna replica pedal. I doubt that there is any difference unless specified. There is a cheaper, non-Cessna type, available from Saitek, with the only difference being its physical shape. Look at the description or go to Saitek's website for more information.

context: do you get 30 days for free ? when you buy this
response: This game is free-to-play, meaning you don't pay to play this game. When you redeem the included code, you get bonus items and a status called "Patron" for 30 days. It had a subscription before, but not now.Hope this helps.

context: Can this be played with a keyboard and a mouse? Or is it best suited for gamepads?
response: It's super easy to play with a keyboard and mouse. There were even times where i would lay down while I played. You only use about 6 buttons on the keyboard, and they are all pretty close to each other. If you don't already have a gamepad, i would suggest not getting one for this game.

context: Can this be used on the wii or the wii u?
response: In Wii, Yes, perfectly... but in Wii U I do not know

context: Will it work for a PS4?
response: According to the developers of Drive Club, all PS3 wheels will work with Drive Club on the PS4. However, according to reports, PS3 wheels aren't working in the XMB menus (or whatever it is that they're calling them these days)

context: Does this game have multiplayer mode?
does this work on nintendo 2ds system?
response: yes it will but you wont be able to use the 3d feature but the will work fine on the 2ds.

context: will this drive play gamecube games?
response: Yes, it is OEM, so it will work like the original.
